data.text: Me ba, sɛ woadi akagyinamu ama ɔyɔnko bi,
sɛ deɛ wokaeɛ ayi ka ama wo
ɛnneɛ yɛ yei, me ba, na fa tete wo ho,
Mma wʼani nkum
Gye wo ho, sɛdeɛ ɔforoteɛ dwane firi ɔbɔmmɔfoɔ nsam
Ɔkwadwofoɔ, kɔ atɛtea nkyɛn;
Ɔnni ɔsahene,
nanso, ɔde aduane sie wɔ ahuhuro ɛberɛ mu
Wo, ɔkwadwofoɔ, wobɛda akɔsi da bɛn?
Nna kakra, nkotɔ kakra,
ɛbɛma ohia aba wo so sɛ ɔkwanmukafoɔ
Onipa teta ne ohuhuni a
deɛ ɔbu nʼani,
deɛ ɔde nʼakoma mu nnaadaa bɔ ɛpɔ bɔne,
Ɛno enti amanehunu bɛba ne so prɛko pɛ;
Nneɛma nsia na Awurade mpɛ,
ani a ɛtra ntɔn,
akoma a ɛdwene amumuyɛ ho,
Ɔdansekurumni a ɔdi atorɔ
Me ba, tie wʼagya ahyɛdeɛ
Fa kyekyere wʼakoma ho daa;
Wonante a, ɛbɛkyerɛ wo ɛkwan;
Na saa ahyɛdeɛ yi yɛ kanea;
ɛtwe wo firi ɔbaa a ɔnni suban pa no ho,
Mma wo kɔn nnɔ nʼahoɔfɛ
ɛfiri sɛ, odwamanfoɔ de animguaseɛ bɛbrɛ wo,
Obi bɛtumi asɔ ogya agu ne srɛ so a
Obi bɛtumi anante gyasramma so a
Saa na ɔbarima a ɔne ɔbarima foforɔ yere da no teɛ
Nnipa mmu ɔkorɔmfoɔ a wakɔwia adeɛ animtiaa
Mmom sɛ wɔkyere no a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔtua ka mmɔho nson;
Ɔbarima a ɔsɛe awadeɛ no nni adwene;
Ɔboro ne animguaseɛ na ɔbɛnya,
Ninkunutweɛ hwanyane okunu abufuo
Ɔrennye mpata biara;
